args.natural_language_statement: For all complex numbers z, |csc z| ≤ |csc (Re z)|. Express in Lean4/Mathlib style as a lemma (no proof), using abs and sin (i.e. csc as 1 / sin). End the statement with := by sorry.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open scoped Real

/-- For all complex numbers z, |csc z| ≤ |csc (Re z)|. Express in Lean4/Mathlib style as a lemma (no proof), using abs and sin (i.e. csc as 1 / sin). End the statement with := by sorry. -/
lemma abs_csc_le_abs_csc_re_tac_1342 (z : ℂ) : Complex.abs (1 / Complex.sin z) ≤ Complex.abs (1 / Complex.sin ↑z.re) := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- For any complex z with sin z ≠ 0 and sin (Re z) ≠ 0, the complex cosecant of z has modulus at least that of the cosecant of Re z. -/
lemma abs_csc_ge_abs_csc_re (z : ℂ) (hz : Complex.sin z ≠ 0) (hre : Complex.sin (z.re : ℂ) ≠ 0) :
  Complex.abs (1 / Complex.sin z) ≥ Complex.abs (1 / Complex.sin (z.re : ℂ)) := by sorry
